Summary: In the industry since 2012, while playing a pivotal role in all aspects of the software stack, from prototype to release, and improving applications with patches based on customer feedback and data in production. Looking to focus more on the C# .NET tech stack.

Experience.location: bitHeads, Tech shop with a focus on cloud-based technology
points: Worked on a portal and mobile facing web app for a SaaS project written in React.js
Eliminated routine project hours spent documenting by creating a Node.js tool in TypeScript that generated the API doc contents.
Created brainCloud’s Command Line tool in Node.js and other test tools, for developers and QA to test and stress test API and server features.
Maintained customer success and brainCloud’s unit tests, examples, and libraries in Java, ObjC, C++, C#, JS, Unity, and Unreal.
Searched brainCloud BaaS code for bugs and marked actionable Jira tasks for required teams.
Wrote documentation, tutorials, and offer guidance to bring new co-workers up to speed on the BaaS environment.
Maintained and wrote Jenkins Pipeline in Groovy, for improved test reporting and team CI.
Developed Test Automation for brainCloud and Nortec/Condair Help websites in Java, to reduce manual testing time spent on an agile team.

Experience.location: Smoke Labs, Tech startup with a focus on mobile games
points: Developed key systems in Blokus, Mattel branded title nominated in the Canadian Video Game Awards for 'Best Game Design' and 'Best Social or Casual Game.'
Experience integrating a multitude of analytics, ad systems, and backends, including Google Analytics, Game Analytics, Flurry, Mopub, and Playhaven.
Spent time working with the external QA team to bridge the company's knowledge gaps between the developer and QA workflows.
Integrated ads, in-app purchases, analytics, and handled product releases of legacy client apps.

references.name: Jason Liang
references.quote: Jonathan is a very details oriented and thorough software development leader/developer. He understands the development cycle from end to end and creates credible plans to deliver to customers on time. As a team leader, he always is able to guide us on the right track during the developing circle and solve the tech issues we met rapidly. He is very opened to share his ideas. He works in concert with his peers/team to provide well thought out, often novel approaches to complex problems then define and implement actions to provide winning solutions.
references.title: Customer Success Specialist at bitHeads.
references.relation: Jonathan was senior to Jason but didn’t manage directly.

references.name: Kyle McInnes
references.quote: Jon is an all around great guy to work with. He's a competent developer, easy to get along with, and is able to take on a variety of tasks with passion. He was often the last one to leave the office and I was always impressed with his dedication.
references.title: Manager at Smoke Labs.
references.relation: Kyle was senior to Jonathan but didn’t manage directly.

references.name: Anthony Bongers
references.quote: Over the course of three years at Smoke Labs I have worked on many projects with Jonathan, spanning from tools to games. Jonathan has consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic, and passion for the projects at hand. I would recommend Jonathan for any company looking for a talented and hard-working developer.
references.title: Game Developer at Smoke Labs.
references.relation: Jonathan worked with Anthony in the same group.
